page.title: 19BROMBOROUGH INDUSTRIAL PARK
page.content: The main companies on site are Tarmac Cubitts, McTay Enginerring, EJS, Van den Burghs and Jurgens. The key activities are construction for housing, chemical works and ships; pipework fabrication, food products based on oils and fats. Van den Burghs is tha oldest company on site and was formed in 1918. It amalgamated with Jurgens in 1932. EJS is the most recent company, being formed in 1977. The various companies emloy well over 2,000 people between them and export goods all over the World.
